body: @shadow3645: Sorry but Kei's friend, Kuroina is a traitor, a good friend wouldn't seduce their friend's boyfriend and fuck him in the shower while their friend was passed out in the other room. Hell who knows how long that affair might have gone on for if Kei hadn't walked in on them before Kuroina could help herself tor some seconds. I mean 2 of the key pillars or friendship are trust and respect, Kuroina violated both those  when she put hands on Kei's man who to be fair has no good self control as he admitted that aside from Kuroina he already had cheated on Kei with another woman so he's failed her twice as a faithful lover so far. Honestly Kei needs a better man in her life, the break up was almost certainly smartest thing she could have done all things considered.
Thanks rossellini im reading this for the story lol
Man the dude needs to man up

They have sex, he ask her if she feels good, she says 100% no, can you still cum? *... goes limp?* Well this ruins the mood. *Sex ends, no one got off* She says let's break up. The guy goes okay and apologises. Doses off, woke up finding her earring in bed, wonders whether he should use it as excuse to meet her again soon.
anyone that can summarise the dialog?

How is she traitorous? He knew their relationship wouldn't have progressed into lovers because he already had a girlfriend. The girl had sex with him because she had feelings for him but she knew he still liked his girlfriend. She went through with it because she wanted an outlet of her feelings for the guy
ohhh no, please don't tell me that's the b!tch As3 traitorous slut's earrings?
I want her to have a happy ending. A pretty, sweet girl.
